setAlwaysDropDown(boolean) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Show the dropdown menu, if attached, even if the button part is clicked.
setArrowColor(Color) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Set the arrow color.
setArrowSize(int) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
sets the size of the arrow
setDisabledArrowColor(Color) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
sets the disabled arrow color
setImage(Image) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Sets the image to draw instead of the triangle.
setPopupMenu(JPopupMenu) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Sets the JPopupMenu to be displayed, when the split part of the button is clicked.
setSeparatorSpacing(int) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Sets the separatorSpacing.Separator spacing is the space above and below the separator( the line drawn when you hover your mouse over the split part of the button).
setSplitWidth(int) - Method in class org.gpl.JSplitButton.JSplitButton
Splitwidth is the width of the split part of the button.
